news.title: Post-doc position available
news.description: Postdoc position available within project FACTORY (New paradigms for latent factor estimation) to work on matrix factorisation techniques at large for data processing, funded by the ERC under a consolidator grant (2016-2021).

Rendering of Day and Night Sky Phenomena in Interactive 3D Geovirtual Environments
Interactive Software Maps for Web-Based Source Code Analysis
